item.title: Basic waveforms used in the control systems and its implimentation technique
item.description: The control theory uses the following waveforms. Step Square Rectangular Sine Triangular Sawtooth There are several techniques to produce these inputs. This post presents an easy way of creating and testing them. Note that the functions presented here are easy to implement but not always efficient. Generalized step function $S_0(t)$ A step wave has only two states and changes from one state to another at a single instance of time.
